title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 78.2 - Fishing and fishing permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 78.2 - Fishing and fishing permits

State Regulations
(a) Permits to fish in the area will be issued for a fee by the Department of

Public Utilities of the City of Troy and are revocable by that department. Special permits may be issued at the discretion of the City of Troy for uses
other than fishing. (b) The ice
fishing season shall extend from January 1st to March 15th each year during
daylight hours only. (c) Ice
fishing is permitted only on that part of the reservoir from the dam southerly
to a continuous line extending between two orange markers on either shoreline
of the reservoir and on that part from the south end of the reservoir northerly
to a continuous line extending between two orange markers on either shoreline
of the reservoir. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
78.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
